title: Implement GitHelper (git.ts) - 12 git operation methods
description:
Implement all 12 methods in src/utils/git.ts GitHelper class:

Repository Methods:
- isRepository() - Check if current directory is a git repo
- getRepositoryRoot() - Get git root directory path
- getMainWorktreePath() - Find main worktree for rsync operations

Worktree Methods:
- addWorktree() - Add new worktree with options
- listWorktrees() - List all worktrees with parsing
- removeWorktree() - Remove worktree with optional force
- findWorktreeByBranch() - Find worktree by branch name (with fuzzy matching)

Branch Methods:
- createBranch() - Create new branch from start point
- deleteBranch() - Delete branch with optional force
- listBranches() - List all branches
- branchExists() - Check if branch exists
- isBranchMerged() - Check merge status for safe deletion
- getCurrentBranch() - Get current branch name

Include comprehensive tests in test/utils/git.test.ts
